logout.successMessage: You have been successfully logged out.

contact.heroText: Have a question or just want to say hi? Feel free to reach out we’d love to hear from you!
contact.formText: Have any questions? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.statementP: According to the General Data Protection Regulation, the personal data controller of a register is obligated to inform the register’s data subjects in a clear manner.
privacyPolicy.inquiries: Contact information in matters related to personal data files:
privacyPolicy.dataSubjectsDesc: Persons included in the register customers.
privacyPolicy.purpose: 3. Purpose of Use of Personal Data
privacyPolicy.rightsP: Customers have the right to access, rectify, delete, and object to their data processing.
privacyPolicy.sourcesP: Collected from customers via forms, emails, and online sources.
privacyPolicy.disclosureP: Not disclosed for marketing purposes outside Café Boardgame Oy.
privacyPolicy.durationP: Personal data is processed as long as necessary for the customer relationship.
privacyPolicy.processorsP: Employees and third-party services process data securely.
privacyPolicy.transferP: No data is transferred outside the EU or EEA.
privacyPolicy.decisionMakingP: No automatic decision-making or profiling is done.

service.Title: Find our service
service.serviceP: Our goal is to make Helsinki the heart of gaming culture and to provide an accessible meeting place for everyone interested in games. Cafe Boardgame is a four-story gaming culture hub, combining a restaurant, café, bar, events, training, and meeting services.

about.title: ABOUT CAFÉ BOARDGAME
about.aboutP: Welcome to Café Boardgame, the heart of gaming culture in Helsinki!

bookingForm.step1Text: (If your group has more than 8 people, please contact us directly for your booking)
bookingForm.step2Text: Here you can optionally request a specific table or game. You can skip this step if you have no specific items to request. Please keep in mind that the Cafe reserves the right to change tables as needed.
bookingForm.step3Submit: By submitting this form you agree to the Terms and Conditions of Cafe Boardgame.
bookingForm.availabilityText: There are no available tables able to seat your group, please call to check if there are ways to host your group.
